For the sake of simplicity, we will only use one particular case to demo.

The following page will display a "Retrieve QR Code" button that will request a QR code to the backend through the "/request-verification" endpoint. To continue, you scan the QR code using your wallet and you will receive a signed DVR that will be displayed in your wallet. Finally, continue generating the proof, where after generating it, it will send another request to the "/verify-proof" endpoint for proof verification.
